segments.text: I'm sorry to trouble you but there is a lot of noise in next room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , is there ? Which room is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ... , I think the neighbor on the right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but I think so . I'm very exhaust but I can't sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right madam , I'll check and tell them to be quiet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the nest room is still noisy , could you give me a different room please ?
segments.speaker: S1
